sen.j: 楯 親忠（たて ちかただ、生年不詳 - 元暦元年1月20日 (旧暦)（1184年3月4日）?）は平安時代末期の武将。
sen.e: Chikatada TATE (born on an unknown date, died in March 4, 1184 [the date unconfirmed]) was a busho (a Japanese military commander) at the end of the Heian period.
sen.cmt: ＊原文カッコ内にある？マークに関しまして、没年月日は疑問点が残る状態であるとの意味に解釈し、（the date unconfirmed）と付け加えて訳しました。
sen.e: Chikatada TATE (born on an unknown date, died on March 4, 1184 [unconfirmed]) was a busho (a Japanese military commander) at the end of the Heian period.
sen.cmt: ・訂正born on an unknown date→date of birth unknown died in March 4,→died on March 4,[the date unconfirmed]→ [unconfirmed]
sen.e: Chikatada TATE (year of birth unknown - March 4, 1184 [unconfirmed]) was a busho (a Japanese military commander) at the end of the Heian period.
sen.cmt: born on an unknown date, died on →year of birth unknown -

sen.j: 源義仲の家臣で、義仲四天王の一人。
sen.e: He was a vassal of MINAMOTO no Yoshinaka, and one of Yoshinaka Shitenno (four most loyal retainers of Yoshinaka).
He was a vassal of MINAMOTO no Yoshinaka, and one of the Yoshinaka Shitenno (four most loyal retainers of Yoshinaka).
sen.cmt: ・訂正one of Yoshinaka Shitenno→one of the Yoshinaka Shitenno
sen.e: He was a vassal of MINAMOTO no Yoshinaka, and one of the Yoshinaka Shitenno (four most loyal retainers of Yoshinaka).
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: He was the sixth son of Yukichika NENOI.
sen.cmt: ＊「根井行親」は、二つの読み方が登録されておりました。両方とも通用する読みと考えられましたが、ここでは、二つのうち、Google検索にて、より多用されていた「ねのいゆきちか」の読みを採用いたしました。
sen.e: He was the sixth son of Yukichika NENOI.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: He was the sixth son of Yukichika NENOI.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: He was commonly called Rokuro ("Rokuro" is a typical Japanese name which occasionally means "the sixth son.").
sen.cmt: ＊六郎が、6番目の息子を指すことがある典型的な日本人名である旨を、括弧つきで訳しております。
sen.e: He was commonly called Rokuro ("Rokuro" is a typical Japanese name which occasionally means "the sixth son.").
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: He was commonly called Rokuro.
sen.cmt: 括弧内は削除しました。

sen.j: 義仲に従って横田河原の合戦や倶利伽羅峠の戦いなどに参戦し、活躍する。
sen.e: He perticipated in the Battle of Yokotagawara and the battle of the Kurikara Pass and fought excellently in the service of Yoshinaka.
sen.cmt: ＊「横田河原の合戦」http://www.google.co.jp/search?tbs=bks:1&tbo=1&q=%22Battle+of+yokotagawara%22+&btnG=%E6%9B%B8%E7%B1%8D%E3%81%AE%E6%A4%9C%E7%B4%A2「横田河原の合戦」の用語登録は無く、「横田河原の戦い」で、the battle at the Yokota River、the Battle of Yokotagawara（定訳不明）との２つの用語登録がございました。Google booksなどで調査の上、the Battle of Yokotagawaraで訳しました。＊「倶利伽羅峠の戦い」the battle of the Kurikara Passにて用語登録があり、使用致しました。ただし、Google booksの検索ではthe Battle of Kurikaraと、pass無しの対訳が、より多用されているように思いました。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Yokotagawara and the battle of the Kurikara Pass following Yoshinaka and fought excellently in the battles.
sen.cmt: ・誤記訂正perticipated→participated・多少読みづらい気がしたので、修正しました。
sen.e: He participated in the Battle of Yokotagawara and the battle of the Kurikara Pass following Yoshinaka and fought excellently in the battles.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1184年、宇治川の合戦に父・行親と共に参戦し、六条河原で討ち取られたとされている。
sen.e: It is said that Chikatada TATE perticipated in the Battle of Uji River in 1184 together with his father, Yukichika, and was killed on the Rokujo-gawara riverbank.
sen.cmt: ＊「宇治川の合戦」 Battle of Uji River、「宇治川の戦い」The battle of Uji-gawa Riverとの用語登録がありました。Google booksの検索ではthe Battle of Ujigawa/the Battle of Uji Riverが多用されているように思い、the Battle of Uji Riverを使用しました。
sen.e: It is said that Chikatada TATE participated in the Battle of Uji River in 1184 together with his father, Yukichika, and was killed on the Rokujo-gawara riverbank.
sen.cmt: ・誤記訂正perticipated→participated
sen.e: It is said that Chikatada TATE participated in the Battle of Ujigawa in 1184 together with his father, Yukichika, and was killed on the Rokujo-gawara riverbank.
sen.cmt: Uji River→Ujigawaとしました。

sen.j: だが、義仲の敗死後に行親の妻が上野国に逃亡した際に同行したとも言われていて、詳細は不明。
sen.e: However, many details are still unknown and it is also said that he accompanied the wife of Yukichika when she escaped to Kozuke Province after Yoshinaka was defeated and killed.
However, details on his death are still unknown and it is also said that he accompanied the wife of Yukichika when she escaped to Kozuke Province after Yoshinaka was defeated and killed.
sen.cmt: ・訂正many details→details on his death
sen.e: However, details on his death are still unknown and it is also said that he accompanied the wife of Yukichika when she escaped to Kozuke Province after Yoshinaka was defeated and killed.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 長野県南佐久郡佐久町辺りに屋敷を構えていた。
sen.e: He had his residence somewhere near present-day Saku-machi, Minami-saku County, Nagano Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 住所は現代のものであることをpresent-dayを付け加えて示しております。
sen.e: He had his residence somewhere near present-day Saku-machi, Minami-saku County, Nagano Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: He had his residence somewhere near present-day Saku-machi, Minami-saku County, Nagano Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
